transcript:
Customer: Vitthal geeti gava Vitthal chitti dhava Vitthal ubha

Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Sir namaskar
Customer: Namaskar bola
Customer: Sir Ankit baat kar raha tha India Mart se

Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello ha bolo bolo bolo
Customer: Ha main India Mart se Ankit baat kar raha tha sir aapka company chal raha tha na aapka Enterprises to aap bole the sir aapki beti call karegi wo use karegi sir hai na to

Customer: Ha
Executive: To kaise kya chal raha hai sir bataiye main help kar dunga sir aapko online business chalaane mein kyuki aapka paisa to already aapka
Customer: Help karoge to kaise starting kaise karne ki yahi mujhe samajhta nahi
Executive: Kya sir
Customer: Are starting kaise karne ki yahi nahi aa raha mujhe
Executive: To ek kaam karo na sir ek baar aap aur aapke bete dono na dono log ek baar mere se call pe ek sath baat karo main pura chalana bata dunga dekho sir kisi bhi cheez ka jaise kehte hain ki aapne kisi bhi dukan kiraye pe li theek hai aur uska paisa aapne saal bhar ka bhar diya to aise hi mat chhodo fir usko khali hai na aap paisa to de chuke aapke bete Chetan sir to aap kam se kam jo paisa lagaya ya fir kaise kya business online chalana hai wo main pura bata dunga aapko aur koi kaam karna hai wo bhi main isme karwa dunga theek hai India Mart ek online market aur is market mein saal ke liye online unhone registration kara liya tha theek hai ha to wo ek saal tak aap apna isme chala sakte ho koi bhi product dal ke aap apne usse sale kar sakte ho isme to fir abhi ye batao offline wala jo dukan wala business phone aapki beti chalana shuru kar diye
Customer: Nahi abhi wo
Customer: Wo kasht bhanjan enterprises ka account khola tha usne
Executive: Hmm hmm theek hai bank mein ha to account maine freeze kar dala wo theek hai abhi GST jo number hai wo to uske naam ka hai na ha fir aage kaise kya hoga
Executive: To GST abhi band mat karao theek hai kyuki ye batao chhat bhanjan ke naam se business jo dukan chal raha hai wo kiska hai aapka hai ki kisi aur ka hai
Customer: Are uska hai bete ka naam ka tha wo ha to wo ek dukan hai theek hai aapka kuch chal raha tha Chetan sir ka kuch dukan tha market mein
Customer: Nahi market mein nahi ghar apna residency jo kamra residency ka ek kamra tha hmm hmm apne apne hi ghar ka ek chota sa kamra tha theek hai wo kamre mein chal raha tha wo

Customer: Ha to fir pehli dikkat to ye hai ki customer enterprises ke naam se jo account open kiya tha maine ha ha are ladke ne wo maine freeze kar dala abhi theek hai aur dusri dusri dikkat ye hai ki GST number uske naam ka hai hmm ha fir wo to nahi hai abhi to mai kaise chala sakta hai ye bhi ye bhi problem hai na
Executive: To ye batao aap abhi kya kaam karte hain
Customer: Jo bhi tha jaise aapke ghar pe hi saman rakha hua tha aap bata rahe hain ki wahin se wo sale karte the to wo saman abhi bhi pada hua hai ya aapne sale nahi jaise order aati thi waise saman mangate the kya order jaise aati thi na waisa saman mangate the theek hai aur saman a to a bechte the ha to saman aisa storage karke nahi rakha hai to abhi ghar pe koi maal pada hai ye batao
Customer: Nahi kuch nahi pada hai
Executive: Kuch nahi pada hai sara ka sara sale out ho chuka hai ha ha to aapne apne bete se baat kiya wo business chalana chahti hain aage kyuki jaise agar kahin se to maal manga karte hain us uska primary knowledge to hona na to knowledge to sir main bata dunga na kya kya unka pehle business to samajhiye aake ki aapke bete karte kya the kya kya bechte the kya kya product dale hain yahan pe unhone jo product aapke dale hue hain na sir wo jyadatar tubular battery ho gaya inverter wala theek hai inverter ho gaya theek hai aur apna solar inverter ho gaya luminous ka ho gaya noble battery ho gaya side ki bike battery ho gayi car battery ho gayi theek hai to main aapko bata raha na ye choti choti cheeze hain yahan pe pade hue hain theek hai solar ke liye bahut ha solar ke liye bahut logo ka phone aata hai mere ko acha to aapke pass phone isliye aata hai kyuki number pada hai na sir aapka yahan pe ha sahi baat hai ha mobile number aapka yahan pe pada hua hai to isliye call aata hai aapke pass ha aur aapke pass mobile number jab rahega internet pe dekhiyega to log aapko call karenge hi saman kharide to ye cheez hai to theek hai Ankit bhaiya ha main ek baat bolta sir aapko main dopahar 2 baje ke ghar ko jaunga theek hai abhi main jaldi mein hoon theek hai kal jab aapka phone aaya to to bhi bus mein tha main travel mein ha chalo koi nahi aap na pahunch ke na mujhe 2 baje 3 baje ke baad mujhe call kar lena theek hai aap aur 2 baje 2:30 baje main aur meri beti aap se baat kar 2:30 baje to nahi sir 2 se 3 baje 3 baje ke baad baat kar sakta ha call kar lena main interest theek hai nahi to 2 baje ke pehle baat kar ya 2 baje se pehle ha theek hai chalega chalega theek hai sir okay okay okay okay
Executive: Okay sir
summary:
Concerns:

- Not understanding how to start the business.

- Account frozen, GST number in son's name.

- Wants to know how to run business online.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to explain the online business process.

- Executive offered to help with other business tasks.

- Executive explained products listed on IndiaMART.



Next Steps: 

- Customer and his daughter will call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- business, online, gst, account, products
